objectives.name: Droid Foundry
objectives.description:
Sector Overview
- Primary function: rapid assembly of B1/B2 chassis, parts casting, and final-line calibration.
- Footprint: multi-block factory lattice anchored into basalt bedrock; enclosed causeways connect sub-halls.

Facilities (observed)
- Smelter stacks and slag pits: continuous melt cycle; waste heat vents create persistent thermal haze.
- Casting hall: modular mold racks for limb/torso frames; coolant trenches run the length of the floor.
- Assembly lines: conveyor gantries with robotic arms; quality-control alcoves every 40â€“60 meters.
- Storage yards: sealed containers of actuators, optics, and power cells; marked lots for finished units.

Infrastructure Notes
- Power draw is high and steady; shutting down sections causes cascading line stoppages and calibration drift.
- Internal rail carts move heavy loads; rails double as cover lines and chokepoints.
- Dense overhead structure (cranes/catwalks) favors defenders with pre-sited firing angles.

Threat & Security Posture (typical)
- Automated sentry nodes at bay doors; interior checkpoints at line junctions.
- Reinforced blast shutters isolate halls during sabotage or fire.
- Expect rapid local reinforcement if alarms propagate along the conveyor control network.

Operational Relevance (MVP)
- Capturing this objective is required for victory and reduces planet-wide enemy sustainment pressure.

objectives.name: Communications Array
objectives.description:
Sector Overview
- Primary function: planetary comms relay (surface-to-orbit uplink), encrypted C2 routing, and signal direction-finding.
- Footprint: elevated spire cluster with multiple dishes; subterranean conduit rooms connect to hardened server vaults.

Antenna Farm
- High-gain dishes: steerable, tracked; likely used for burst transmissions to minimize intercept windows.
- Phased arrays: flat-panel emitters for broad coverage; vulnerable to power disruption but quick to re-route.
- Backup masts: smaller, redundant antennas on perimeter pylons.

Signal Infrastructure
- Cable runs: armored conduits radiate outward; junction boxes every few dozen meters.
- Server vaults: temperature-controlled bays; isolated racks for encryption keys and routing tables.
- EW room: spectrum analyzers, jammer controllers, and traffic-shaping equipment.

Threat & Security Posture (typical)
- Narrow access points: few doors, many fences; defenders can channel attackers into kill corridors.
- Sensor saturation: cameras, motion grids, and passive RF sniffers.
- Expect counter-recon: they will attempt to map approach vectors and jam coordination.

Operational Relevance (MVP)
- Capturing this objective is required for victory and reduces planet-wide enemy coordination and reinforcement efficiency.

objectives.name: Power Plant
objectives.description:
Sector Overview
- Primary function: planetary grid node providing stable power for industrial zones and defense networks.
- Footprint: turbine halls + control building; ringed by transformer yards and redundant feedlines.

Generation & Distribution
- Turbine hall: long-span chamber with multiple generator banks; constant vibration and high noise.
- Control room: analog redundancies (hard switches) alongside digital monitoring; limited line-of-sight.
- Transformer yard: exposed equipment, heavy fencing; many small structures create broken sightlines.
- Feedlines: multiple exits to reduce single-point failures; routes are predictable and heavily guarded.

Environmental Factors
- Heat plumes reduce visibility; condensate creates slick surfaces near vents.
- Electrical hazards: arc flash risk near damaged transformers; intermittent power surges during combat.

Threat & Security Posture (typical)
- Perimeter focus: defenders often hold the yard and choke the control room entrances.
- Shutdown protocols: segmented breakers can isolate areas; defenders may cut power to deny equipment use.
- Expect booby traps around access panels, breaker cabinets, and junction corridors.

Operational Relevance (MVP)
- Capturing this objective is required for victory and reduces planet-wide enemy fortification and sustainment capability.
